activities: 500friends provides loyalty marketing software to retailers operating in the EU.  Retailers use the software to deploy and administer customer loyalty programs/schemes.  Program member data including email address, transaction history, and other data may be hosted on our cloud based web infrastructure.  We do not capture or store payment information of any kind.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer loyalty program data including email address, transaction history, loyalty program login credentials.  We do not process or store payment information.
